QueryResult.text: SELECT FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, NAME, CREATOR_ID, PATH_NAME, IS_VISIBLE, PARENT_FOLDER_ID, ASSOC_OBJ_ID, ASSOC_OBJ_TYPE, OWNER_ID, OWNER_GROUP_ID, FOLDER_TYPE, IS_SYSTEM_CREATED, HAS_ALL_PARTICIPANTS, AREA_ID, FOLDER_ID, USER_ID, SUM(PERMISSION_VALUE) PERMISSION_VALUE, MODIFY_DATE FROM CLB_DMS_FOLDERS_INST_R_V0 GROUP BY FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, NAME, CREATOR_ID, PATH_NAME, IS_VISIBLE, PARENT_FOLDER_ID, ASSOC_OBJ_ID, ASSOC_OBJ_TYPE, OWNER_ID, OWNER_GROUP_ID, FOLDER_TYPE, IS_SYSTEM_CREATED, HAS_ALL_PARTICIPANTS, AREA_ID, FOLDER_ID, USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE
